value:
$WmMPID_総選挙覚醒チキ,ch04_12_Tiki_F_ELECTION022,Face|I will care for things here, Chrom.
Focus on shoring up our defenses
on the right flank, if you will.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_ELECTION022,Face|Understood. It looks like quite
a few foes have gathered, but...$k$pWith this single strike, I will
change fate!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_ELECTION022,Face|Oh! Thank you for the support!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_ELECTION022,Face|How are you faring, Prince Seliph?
Your troops did well to withstand
an attack while so outnumbered!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_ELECTION022,Face|Your timely intervention was just
what we needed to turn the tide.
Let us press our advantage!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_総選挙覚醒チキ,ch04_12_Tiki_F_ELECTION022,Face|$Fi1500|We've successfully driven the
bulk of the opposing forces back.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_ELECTION022,Face|No time to relax just yet. I'll take
a small detachment and scour
the area for any stragglers.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙覚醒チキ,ch04_12_Tiki_F_ELECTION022,Face|Such caution, Chrom! Has your role
as exalt brought about this new
outlook of yours?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_ELECTION022,Face|If anything, it's from working with
Frederick and Robin so closely.
They must've rubbed off on me!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_ELECTION022,Face|Chrom has the right of it. There are
reports of troops gathering on the
western hills.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_ELECTION022,Face|Those reports can be updated.
That camp has been dealt with.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_ELECTION022,Face|Welcome back, Byleth. I am glad
to see you returned to us safely.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙覚醒チキ,ch04_12_Tiki_F_ELECTION022,Face|You managed to take out that
entire camp yourself? But the
reports counted so many troops...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_ELECTION022,Face|I was not by myself, no. Some
students from Garreg Mach were
there to help.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_ELECTION022,Face|Even so, leading such a small team
to victory against overwhelming odds
is no small feat...$k$pI understand now why Commander
Anna referred to you as the Ashen
Demon. A fitting title!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_ELECTION022,Face|That name was given to me by
others. I didn't come up with it
myself, nor would I.$k$pI would much prefer a title with a
somewhat softer feel—like Prince
Seliph, the Scion of Light.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_ELECTION022,Face|Well, to be truthful, I did not choose
that title for myself either...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_ELECTION022,Face|In any case, it is clear you both
inspire camaraderie on the battlefield.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙覚醒チキ,ch04_12_Tiki_F_ELECTION022,Face|With all of us working together,
peace in Askr feels like a reality
that is not so distant after all.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_ELECTION022,Face|It has been an honor to fight
shoulder to shoulder with
such exemplary heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_ELECTION022,Face|Exemplary? Hm...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_ELECTION022,Face|Do you disagree, Prince Seliph?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_ELECTION022,Face|No, no. Nothing like that. Pay me no
mind. Let us focus on bringing peace
to Askr while we are here.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_ELECTION022,Face|Hmm...$k$p
